Package cards

Class ActionCard

java.lang.Object
cards.Card
cards.ActionCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollectFromPlayer, CollectFromTheBank, PayTheBank, PayThePlayer
public abstract class ActionCard
extends Card
Abstract class providing a skeletal implementation of an action card, which asks the player to either pay to or collect money from another player or the Bank

An action card is picked whenever the player ends up on an orange space.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionCard

      public ActionCard​(java.lang.String name)
      Constructor with the specified name of this card as parameter

      The name of an action card is indicative of the action it specifies (for example, Tax Refund, Sell an Item, etc.).

      Parameters:
      name - name of this card

  • Method Details

    • getInfo

      public abstract java.lang.String getInfo()
      Abstract method for returning the card description to be displayed on the console during the actual gameplay
      Specified by:
      getInfo in class Card
      Returns:
      card description to be displayed on the console during the actual gameplay

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this action card, which includes its name

      In particular, the representation contains the following details:

      • Type of card (Action Card)
      • Name of the card (for example, Tax Refund, Sell an Item, etc.)
      • The header "Amount" (the specifics/values are supplied in the toString() methods of the subclasses)
      Overrides:
      toString in class Card
      Returns:
      string representation of this action card, which includes its name
